attributes.background: We don't want Britain to be a part of the WHO (World health organisation) or the WEF (World economic forum).

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

End the UK’s membership of the World Health Organisation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617450

Hold a referendum on the UK's membership of the World Health Organisation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616964

The UK is not a member of the World Economic Forum.
